items.title: US applications for jobless benefits rise last week, but layoffs remain historically low
items.description: More Americans filed for unemployment benefits last week, but U.S. layoffs remain in the same historically healthy range of the past few years

items.title: Students face new cellphone restrictions in 17 states as school year begins
items.description: As students start school this year, 17 states and the District of Columbia are imposing new cellphone restrictions

items.title: Reporter says former aide to New York City Mayor Eric Adams gave her a chip bag filled with cash
items.description: A New York City reporter says a former aide to Mayor Eric Adams gave her a potato chip bag filled with cash following a campaign event
